dcterms:description: The A3COSMOS dataset contains data from the ALMA archive in the COSMOS field, focusing on the cold molecular gas evolution out to redshift 6.
dcterms:title: A3COSMOS dataset

dcterms:description: Simulated images created using the CASA tool simalma based on the ALMA Cycle 5.3 antenna configuration.
dcterms:title: ALMA Cycle 5.3 simulated images

dcterms:description: The REBELS dataset focuses on the selection and characterization of luminous interstellar medium reservoirs in the universe at redshift greater than 6.5.

dcterms:description: The ASPECS dataset is an ALMA spectroscopic survey in the Hubble Ultra Deep Field, providing a comprehensive survey description.

dcterms:description: The ALPINE dataset is focused on the ALMA [CII] survey, detailing data processing, catalogs, and statistical source properties.
